about_the_game:
"Escape the infinite loop in just 10 seconds? Experience the thrill of the 10 Second Rule" releasing on September
To ensure you don't miss the release, please add it to your wishlist!

This is a Demo Version!

The demo version includes approximately 20% of the content from the full version.

The game rules are super simple!
"Whatever happens, leave the room after 10 seconds."
"Aim for the 10th lab."
That's it!

You'll get notified upon release, so you won't miss the thrilling "10-Second Rule Demo"!
Add it to your wishlist now and look forward to the release!




You don't need to read below this line. (This section introduces the game to potential players)

Recommended for these people

In a busy daily life, there's no time to play games for long periods.
The game is monotonous and gets boring quickly.
Many games have complex controls and long tutorials, making them tedious to start.

Because
Playable in Short Bursts: With 10-second loops, you can quickly enjoy the game even in a busy daily life.
Reduced Monotony: Appropriate randomness ensures different challenges each time, making it enjoyable to play repeatedly without getting bored.
Easy to Understand Controls: The game has intuitive controls that you can enjoy without a tutorial, allowing anyone to get immersed in the game right away.

User Review
"10-Second Rule PV First Impressions (from my friend O.S):
'It looks interesting, reminiscent of something like the 8th exit! The time limit adds tension, making me curious about the next stages.'"

The Inspiration Behind "10 Second Rule"
The development of the "10 Second Rule demo" began as a personal challenge to break free from the monotonous daily loop. One day, after returning from university, I questioned the repetitive nature of my life. It was then that I stumbled upon a time attack (RTA) game video online. Watching players clear challenges in mere seconds ignited a spark within me, making me wonder, "How exciting would it be if a game could deliver results in just 10 seconds?"

To bring this idea to life, I decided to develop a game called "10 Second Rule". The goal is for players to clear different challenges within 10 seconds. The game is designed to be simple yet provide players with intense and rapid satisfaction. Currently, the game is in its final development stage, and we are gearing up for the August 5 release. I'm excited to see how players will react to this game.

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: How much content is there?
A: There's about three times as much content as in "Exit 8".

Q: How replayable is the game?
A: Even after completing it once, there are still twice as many unseen stages to explore.

Q: What is the difficulty like? Is it enjoyable for beginners?
A: Beginners might reach the 5th lab, while advanced players could reach the 10th lab. It’s designed to be enjoyable for beginners too!

Q: What support is available for bugs or issues?
A: As a university student with plenty of free time, I will address any issues promptly.

Q: How long does each play session last?
A: Between 10 and 30 minutes.

Add it to your wishlist now and look forward to the "10 Second Rule demo" release notification!
